title: My Pixel 4 restarted itself and now it doesn’t come up. It stays on Loading screen with a G. what?!!
content:
My Pixel 4 restarted itself and now it doesn’t come up. It stays on Loading screen with a G. 
I tried to reset the phone but it didn’t work. I waited till it turned off and tried to charge it to make it work, but it didn’t. It’s a Pixel 4.
